body: LEAD: Tennis Mayotte Advances: Tim Mayotte, the defending champion, defeated sixth-seeded Christo van Rensburg, 6-2, 7-5, yesterday in the semifinals of the United States Pro Indoor tournament in Philadelphia. Mayotte, who extended his winning streak to 14 matches, rallied from a 2-5 deficit in the second set to take the 1-hour-19-minute match.
title: RESULTS PLUS

body: LEAD: Track and Field Remigino Takes 800-Meter: Mike Remigino, a freshman at Manhattan College and son of a former Jasper, Lindy Remigino, the 1952 Olympic 100-meter gold medalist, captured the 800-meter run in 1 minute 54.04 seconds yesterday at the Reebok/Metropolitan Athletics Congress indoor championships at West Point, N.Y. title: Results Plus
